Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MarketBoard

Class MarketBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MarketBoard.MarketBoard
public class MarketBoard
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the market board which contains the tray with the marbles and the slide.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MarketBoard​(java.lang.String file)
    This the constructor of this class, no parameters are needed.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Marble> getColumn​(int column)
    This method gets a list which contains the column (with index 'column') of the tray.
    java.util.ArrayList<Marble> getRow​(int row)
    This method gets a list which contains the row (with index 'row') of the tray.
    Marble getSlide()
    This method gets the marble which is temporarily out of the tray.
    java.util.ArrayList<Marble> getTray()
    This method gets the tray.
    java.util.List<Marble> showMarket()  
    java.util.ArrayList<Marble> takeColumn​(int column)
    This method returns a list which contains the column (with index 'column') of the tray and it modifies the tray and the slide according to the rules of the game.
    java.util.ArrayList<Marble> takeRow​(int row)
    This method returns a list which contains the row (with index 'row') of the tray and it modifies the tray and the slide according to the rules of the game.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MarketBoard

      public MarketBoard​(java.lang.String file)
      This the constructor of this class, no parameters are needed. It crates the tray and the slide and it randomizes the position of the marbles this method asserts that the dimensions of the rows, columns, and the tray size are coherent. The coherence check is made by the parser

  • Method Details

    • getSlide

      public Marble getSlide()
      This method gets the marble which is temporarily out of the tray.
      Returns:
      Marble

    • getRow

      public java.util.ArrayList<Marble> getRow​(int row) throws IllegalMarketException
      This method gets a list which contains the row (with index 'row') of the tray.
      Parameters:
      row - the index of the row
      Returns:
      an ArrayList which contains the row
      Throws:
      IllegalMarketException - if the row with index 'row' does not exist

    • takeRow

      public java.util.ArrayList<Marble> takeRow​(int row) throws IllegalMarketException
      This method returns a list which contains the row (with index 'row') of the tray and it modifies the tray and the slide according to the rules of the game.
      Parameters:
      row - the index of the row
      Returns:
      an ArrayList which contains the row
      Throws:
      IllegalMarketException - if the row with index 'row' does not exist

    • getColumn

      public java.util.ArrayList<Marble> getColumn​(int column) throws IllegalMarketException

      Parameters:
      column - the index of the column
      Returns:
      an ArrayList which contains the column
      Throws:
      IllegalMarketException - if the column with index 'column' does not exist

    • takeColumn

      public java.util.ArrayList<Marble> takeColumn​(int column) throws IllegalMarketException
      This method returns a list which contains the column (with index 'column') of the tray and it modifies the tray and the slide according to the rules of the game.
      Parameters:
      column - the index of the column
      Returns:
      an ArrayList which contains the column
      Throws:
      IllegalMarketException - if the column with index 'column' does not exist

    • showMarket

      public java.util.List<Marble> showMarket()
      Returns:
      a list of marbles which represents the market and the slide (the marble in the last posistion)
